author: rkumar
msg: Pick the user set serviceName instead of the ClsName

author: gdaniels
msg: Correctly throw deserialized faults in all cases.

author: gdaniels
msg: Remove undeploy test from TCP sample, because the TCP transport
can't dispatch to the AdminService automatically yet.  To solve this, we'll
probably either a) deploy the AdminService at the WSDD namespace
URI (so namespace-based dispatch works), or b) use a transport-level
or SOAP Header based dispatch mechanism for TCP.

author: gdaniels
msg: 1) AxisFault now has a static makeFault() method which encapsulates
logic which was being repeated all over the place (i.e. "if this is an
AxisFault, throw it, otherwise wrap the Exception in an AxisFault and
3) All AxisFaults get a stacktrace in their <detail> element by default
4) Catch and unwrap InvocationTargetExceptions closer to where we
actually know about them (i.e. the providers)
Update FaultServiceTestCase to catch AxisFaults specifically.
